description.0: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to be an audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.

0.0: HP increased by <cryo>20%</cryo>. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on <cryo>1.2%</cryo> of the wielder's Max HP.
